ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Digest Number 543
ygData.msgSnippet: I m still in the first or second one-- the one where you go to Castle Helm. The book I got said you re supposed to find Fenthick in an alcove in the east-- but
ygData.messageBody:
I'm still in the first or second one-- the one where you go to Castle Helm.
The book I got said you're supposed to find Fenthick in an alcove in the
east-- but I haven't found him. Have you?
I wasn't clear if he was outside or inside bc the guidebook was kinda
crappy.
luv,
-Su

>
> Neverwinter Nights is a cool game. In the single player I've gotten to
the final chapter, but Haven't gotten all the way through it yet. I
haven't Played Warcraft 3 yet, but My Boyfriend just got it today & he's
playing it as I type this.. Looks interesting... Unfortunately I do not
have enough room on my hard drive for it =(
> Kat
> Su <suceress@...> wrote: I've never played Warcraft but I do
play Neverwinter Nights. Man, that's a
> fun game. :-)
> My mom, myself, my brother, and my sister all have seperate accounts. :-)
> luv,
> -Su
>
> LOL....well we started 3 years ago. I play,my wife plays and our kids have
> an account too. We have lots of fun at at. Of course now we are splitting
> time with Neverwinter Nights and Warcraft 3. But always go back to EQ...:>
>
>
